message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and interests. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $125 for this item. I understand that it's an investment, but I assure you it will provide significant returns in terms of functionality and convenience. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further or if there's any way I can make this offer more appealing to you.
